text: Matt Walsh (born October 13, 1964) is an American actor, comedian, movie director, and screenwriter. He is best known as a founding member of the Upright Citizens Brigade sketch comedy troupe and for playing Mike McLintock on the HBO series Veep. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Audio interview on The Sound of Young America: MP3 Link *Interviewed by Josh Fulton on Improv Resource Center Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: Matt Walsh (comedian)
